title: Insert Chart Not Translated into Chinese in Context Menu
description: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese as expected.
OB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'Insert Chart' option should be translated into Chinese in the context menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software.
2. Go to the layout where you can insert charts.
3. Right-click in the layout to bring up the context menu.
4. Observe that the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
